thread.title: Paola Saultino wants to give 'blowjobs' to every No voter on Pompa Tour | Metro News
thread.title_full: Paola Saultino wants to give 'blowjobs' to every No voter on Pompa Tour | Metro News

author: Charles White
title: Paola Saultino wants to give 'blowjobs' to every No voter on Pompa Tour | Metro News
text:
Woman who vowed to give 19,419,507 blowjobs is coming to the UK Charles White Monday 20 Feb 2017 12:20 pm She’s pledged to come to the UK to thank the ‘smart’ No voters (Pictures: Paola Saulino) 
An Italian who was so politically motivated she pledged to give a blowjob to every No voter in an Italian referendum is heading to the UK. 
Paola Saulino, 27, has raised eyebrows with her unique take on political campaigning. Albinos are being hunted in Africa and 'harvested' for their body parts 
The constitutional referendum was hotly contested and Prime Minister Renzi resigned after he lost to the No side. 
From the city of pizza, Paola of Naples, is apparently delivering on her promise despite having ‘jaw ache’. 
She said that so far she has far donated her oral services to 400 voters who rejected reducing the number of MPs, limiting the operating costs of the institutions and giving greater power to the PM amongst other measures. Saulino needs to know there is a demand before she extends her tour (Pictures: Paola Saulino) 
The Pompa Tour captured headlines and many’s imagination and was split into a 10-date jaunt followed by a second 12-date journey through Italy. 
Being a ‘woman of her word’ Saulino is aiming for ‘one million’ blowjobs. 
#SwedenStrong trends in response to Donald Trump's 'made up' terror attack Now the more than 100,000 Italians who live in the UK can look forward to her arrival as she promises a trip. 
Revealed by the Daily Star Online the Italian wants to pleasure the ‘smart’ voters who rejected the constitutional reforms. 
She told the paper: ‘The British Italians who voted ‘No’ in referendum are very smart. The Italian has already complained of ‘jaw ache’ after her first 10-day jaunt (Pictures: Paola Saulino) 
‘For this reason I would like to give them the best blowjob. I think that their energy was important for us. Thank you guys.’ £150,000 raised for man who spends life caring for terminally ill children 
The thankful woman values bilateral relations between Italy and the UK and eligible British Italians will be entered into a draw where treats will be on offer. 
Saulino is considering work in the adult film industry and has already encouraged local side SSC Napoli to victory by promising oral favours if they win big. 
Those wanting her to visit need to get in contact to tell her to come to extend the tour to the UK – Saulino’s Instagram already has 287,000 followers. The Italian was unfazed by claims ‘No’ could threaten European stability when she backed the campaign (Picture: Paola Saulino) 
Paola was part of more than 19 million voters who voted No which divided the country and the vote sent shock-waves through the money markets as well as in the corridors of power. 
Ulrich Grillo, chief of the Federation of German Industries, claimed the loss of the referendum endangered the Euro.
